text:
That's amazing!
You're going to have lessons with everyone here!

Yeah,
it's a rare opportunity, so make the most of it.

It feels like when we have PE with other classes!
I'm so excited!

Everyone else is in it as a learning opportunity, and
I hope Kaho can help everyone else realize that, too.

Let's learn,
and grow stronger together.

Yes,
but don't forget to have fun! Can you do that?

Of course!
I'll show you my power-up!
